metadata.title: CVE-2020-26412 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Removed group members were able to use the To-Do functionality to retrieveupdated information on confidential epics starting in GitLab EE 13.2 before13.6.2.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
